title: War of the Supreme Mysteries - Novel Updates
tags: Alternate World   Ancient China   Beast Companions   Beautiful Female Lead   Clever Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Romantic Subplot   Ruthless Protagonist   Soldiers   Strong Love Interests   Tribal Society   World Travel

description: Donford (Dong Fang) Wu, part of the special military force, Cheetah Troops, was transported back in time to ancient China while on a special mission. There, he starts his lonely journey of cultivation.>
